headline: Spotting Winners: HCA Healthcare (NYSE:HCA) And Hospital Chains Stocks In Q4
summary: Earnings results often indicate what direction a company will take in the months ahead. With Q4 behind us, let’s have a look at HCA Healthcare (NYSE:HCA) and its peers.
